title: Do Energy Efficiency Resource Standards Reduce Electricity Consumption?\ from Staggered State AdoptionThis paper is a revision of APEP-0130 (which itself revised APEP-0119). See https://github.com/SocialCatalystLab/auto-policy-evals/tree/main/papers/apep_0130 for the previous version. This revision addresses data provenance, adds treatment intensity analysis using DSM expenditures, implements Synthetic DiD robustness, and provides welfare analysis with social cost of carbon. (v3)
revision_rationale: User requested comprehensive revision addressing code integrity issues and full methodological extension
